description: This file defines a React functional component called 'Toast' which serves as a UI notification placeholder. It renders a styled div based on the 'type' prop (error, success, or default), displaying a message. It is intended for inline display of toast notifications, with most toasts in the application shown via a DOM portal, but this component allows for inline usage.

methods.name: Toast({ message, type = 'info' })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a styled notification message based on props 'message' and 'type'.
